meanings.definition: The policy or action of using vigorous campaigning to bring about political or social change.
meanings.sent1: Her activism in fighting for equal rights inspired many people to join the cause.
meanings.sent2: Environmental activism is crucial in protecting our planet for future generations.
meanings.sent3: The activism of the squirrels in the park demanding more nuts was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His activism against injustice was a beacon of hope in a world filled with darkness.
meanings.sent5: The activism of the waves crashing against the shore was a powerful force of nature.

meanings.definition: The practice of taking action to achieve a political or social goal.
meanings.sent1: Their activism in organizing peaceful protests led to positive changes in society.
meanings.sent2: Youth activism plays a significant role in shaping the future of our communities.
meanings.sent3: The activism of the ants working together to build their anthill was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her activism in spreading kindness and compassion made the world a better place.
meanings.sent5: The activism of the sun shining brightly in the sky brought warmth and light to all.
